description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，曾任吴郡都尉、太守。因上表意图对付孙策，被孙策发现后处死。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han dynasty who served as the Commandant and Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery. He was executed by Sun Ce after Sun Ce discovered his plot against him.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，为孙吴基业的奠基者之一。在统一江东过程中与许贡发生冲突，并最终处死了许贡。后遭许贡门客刺杀身亡。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and one of the founders of the state of Eastern Wu. He clashed with Xu Gong during his conquest of Jiangdong, eventually executing him, and was later assassinated by Xu Gong's retainers.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的一个郡，治所在今江苏苏州。
description.en: A commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, with its administrative seat in modern-day Suzhou, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，许贡与孙策等人物活跃于其末期。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, during the late period of which figures like Xu Gong and Sun Ce were active.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名士，许贡的好友，为躲避董卓之乱而投奔许贡。
description.en: A renowned scholar in the late Eastern Han dynasty and a friend of Xu Gong, whom he sought refuge with to escape the turmoil caused by Dong Zhuo.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣、军阀，其乱政导致许靖等人逃离京城。
description.en: A powerful minister and warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty, whose tyrannical rule caused figures like Xu Jing to flee the capital.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年吴郡太守，曾是许贡的上司。后遭许贡迫害。
description.en: Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery in the late Eastern Han dynasty and Xu Gong's former superior. He was later persecuted by Xu Gong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，其势力曾进入扬州，并击败了割据江东的周氏兄弟。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty whose forces entered Yang Province and defeated the Zhou brothers who controlled Jiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年人物，与兄弟割据江东，被袁术击败后，在逃亡途中为许贡所杀。
description.en: A figure in the late Eastern Han dynasty who, along with his brothers, controlled Jiangdong. After being defeated by Yuan Shu, he was killed by Xu Gong while fleeing.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，由朝廷任命的扬州刺史，后被孙策击败。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han dynasty appointed by the imperial court as the Inspector of Yang Province, who was later defeated by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年将领，孙坚旧部，曾任吴郡都尉，是许贡的下属。
description.en: A general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, formerly a subordinate of Sun Jian. He served as the Commandant of Wu Commandery under Xu Gong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，孙策之父。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the father of Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年吴郡名士，曾帮助盛宪躲避许贡的迫害。
description.en: A renowned scholar of Wu Commandery in the late Eastern Han dynasty who helped Sheng Xian hide from Xu Gong's persecution.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年人物，许贡的部下，曾收留遭迫害的盛宪和被击败的严白虎。
description.en: A figure in the late Eastern Han dynasty and a subordinate of Xu Gong, who gave shelter to the persecuted Sheng Xian and the defeated Yan Baihu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年吴郡一带的山贼头领，曾接纳被孙策击败的许贡。
description.en: A bandit leader in the Wu Commandery area during the late Eastern Han dynasty, who once sheltered Xu Gong after his defeat by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉最后一位皇帝，许贡曾上表于他，意图调走孙策。
description.en: The last emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty, to whom Xu Gong submitted a memorial proposing to transfer Sun Ce away.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏的奠基者。许贡在上表中曾提及孙策对他构成威胁。
description.en: A powerful minister in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the founder of the state of Cao Wei. Xu Gong mentioned in his memorial that Sun Ce posed a threat to him.

description.zh-cn: 秦末民变领袖，西楚霸王。许贡在给汉献帝的上表中将孙策与他相提并论。
description.en: A rebel leader during the late Qin dynasty and the Hegemon-King of Western Chu. Xu Gong compared Sun Ce to him in his memorial to Emperor Xian.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年官员，在197年被朝廷任命为吴郡太守。
description.en: An official in the late Eastern Han dynasty who was appointed by the imperial court as the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery in 197.

description.zh-cn: 忠于许贡的家臣或门客。在许贡被杀后，他们为主人报仇，成功刺杀了孙策。
description.en: Retainers or clients loyal to Xu Gong. After Xu Gong was killed, they avenged their master by successfully assassinating Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年人物，与兄弟割据江东，后被袁术击败。
description.en: A figure in the late Eastern Han dynasty who, along with his brothers, controlled Jiangdong and was later defeated by Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年人物，与兄弟割据江东，后被袁术击败。
description.en: A figure in the late Eastern Han dynasty who, along with his brothers, controlled Jiangdong and was later defeated by Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 许贡在汉末初平年间（190-193年）任吴郡都尉。
description.en: Xu Gong served as the Commandant of Wu Commandery during the Chuping era (190-193) of the late Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 约194年，许贡接替盛宪成为吴郡太守，直至195年被孙策击败。
description.en: Around 194, Xu Gong succeeded Sheng Xian as the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery until he was defeated by Sun Ce in 195.

description.zh-cn: 195年，孙策在由拳击败时任吴郡太守的许贡。
description.en: In 195, Sun Ce defeated Xu Gong, then the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery, at Youquan.

description.zh-cn: 197年，孙策因截获许贡意图不利于自己的上表，下令将其处死。
description.en: In 197, after intercepting a memorial from Xu Gong that was detrimental to him, Sun Ce ordered Xu Gong's execution.

description.zh-cn: 许贡是名士许靖的好友，在许靖为躲避董卓之乱逃到江东时收留了他。
description.en: Xu Gong was a friend of the renowned scholar Xu Jing and gave him shelter when Xu Jing fled to Jiangdong to escape the turmoil of Dong Zhuo.

description.zh-cn: 许靖为躲避董卓之乱而逃离。
description.en: Xu Jing fled to escape the turmoil caused by Dong Zhuo.

description.zh-cn: 许贡任吴郡都尉时，其上司是吴郡太守盛宪。
description.en: When Xu Gong served as the Commandant of Wu Commandery, his superior was the Grand Administrator Sheng Xian.

description.zh-cn: 许贡成为吴郡太守后，试图迫害前任太守盛宪。
description.en: After becoming the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery, Xu Gong attempted to persecute his predecessor, Sheng Xian.

description.zh-cn: 周喁与兄弟们被袁术的势力击败。
description.en: Zhou Yong and his brothers were defeated by the forces of Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 周昂与兄弟们被袁术的势力击败。
description.en: Zhou Ang and his brothers were defeated by the forces of Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 周昕与兄弟们被袁术的势力击败。
description.en: Zhou Xin and his brothers were defeated by the forces of Yuan Shu.

description.zh-cn: 在周喁被袁术击败并逃回会稽的途中，许贡杀害了他。
description.en: While Zhou Yong was fleeing back to Kuaiji after being defeated by Yuan Shu, Xu Gong killed him.

description.zh-cn: 195年，孙策击败了由朝廷任命的扬州刺史刘繇。
description.en: In 195, Sun Ce defeated Liu Yao, the Inspector of Yang Province appointed by the imperial court.

description.zh-cn: 当许贡任吴郡太守时，朱治是其下属，担任吴郡都尉。
description.en: When Xu Gong was the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery, Zhu Zhi was his subordinate, serving as the Commandant.

description.zh-cn: 朱治是孙坚的旧部。
description.en: Zhu Zhi was a former subordinate of Sun Jian.

description.zh-cn: 高岱帮助盛宪躲藏，以逃避许贡的迫害。
description.en: Gao Dai helped Sheng Xian go into hiding to escape persecution by Xu Gong.

description.zh-cn: 许昭将受到许贡迫害的盛宪藏匿于家中。
description.en: Xu Zhao hid Sheng Xian, who was being persecuted by Xu Gong, in his home.

description.zh-cn: 因高岱帮助盛宪，许贡试图加害高岱。
description.en: Because Gao Dai helped Sheng Xian, Xu Gong attempted to harm him.

description.zh-cn: 许贡被孙策击败后，投奔了山贼头领严白虎。
description.en: After being defeated by Sun Ce, Xu Gong sought refuge with the bandit leader Yan Baihu.

description.zh-cn: 孙策击败了山贼头领严白虎。
description.en: Sun Ce defeated the bandit leader Yan Baihu.

description.zh-cn: 严白虎被孙策击败后，投奔了许昭。
description.en: After being defeated by Sun Ce, Yan Baihu sought refuge with Xu Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 许昭是许贡的部下。
description.en: Xu Zhao was a subordinate of Xu Gong.

description.zh-cn: 许贡上表朝廷，建议将孙策召回京城加以控制，意图削弱其势力。
description.en: Xu Gong submitted a memorial to the imperial court, suggesting that Sun Ce be summoned back to the capital to be controlled, in an attempt to weaken his power.

description.zh-cn: 作为吴郡太守，许贡向汉献帝上表。
description.en: As the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery, Xu Gong submitted a memorial to Emperor Xian.

description.zh-cn: 为给主人许贡报仇，许贡的门客在200年刺杀了孙策，导致其伤重不治身亡。
description.en: To avenge their master Xu Gong, his retainers assassinated Sun Ce in 200, leading to his death from the wounds.

description.zh-cn: 建安二年（197年），朝廷任命陈瑀为吴郡太守。
description.en: In the second year of Jian'an (197), the imperial court appointed Chen Yu as the Grand Administrator of Wu Commandery.
